summary.para: Used only for its functionality. It has no methods of its own.

remarks.para: Note This interface is supported through Windows XP Service Pack 3 (SP3) and Windows Server 2003. It is not supported in Windows Vista and later versions of Windows.
The IID for this interface is IID_IDefViewFrame. Use the service ID SID_DefView (defined in shlguid.h) in a call to QueryService as shown in this example.
